lines.text: create integer variable with name sum = 0
DUMMY
matrix is a new array of integers with size 5 by 5
x is a new integer variable
create new pair of integers called ch
in a for loop , change i from 0 to 5 exclusive incrementing i
for integer j = 0 to 5 exclusive incrementing j
read x
set matrix [ i ] [ j ] to x
if x is equal to 1
set the first element of ch to i
set the second element of ch to j
DUMMY
DUMMY
DUMMY
if ch . first is less than 2 , change sum to sum + ( 2 - ch . first )
lines.code: if ( ch . first < 2 ) sum = sum + ( 2 - ch . first ) ;

lines.text: if ch . first is greater than 2 , assign sum + ( ch . first - 2 ) to sum
lines.code: if ( ch . first > 2 ) sum = sum + ( ch . first - 2 ) ;

lines.text: if ch . second < 2 , assign sum + ( 2 - ch . second ) to sum
lines.code: if ( ch . second < 2 ) sum = sum + ( 2 - ch . second ) ;

lines.text: if ch . second > 2 , change sum to sum + ( ch . second - 2 )
lines.code: if ( ch . second > 2 ) sum = sum + ( ch . second - 2 ) ;

lines.text: print sum
assign 0 to sum
